dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 54 IH: Farewell to Unnecessary Energy Lifelines Reform Act of 2021
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Biggs introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committees on Oversight and Reform, and Science, Space, and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To repeal the Department of Agriculture bioenergy subsidy programs and other related subsidy programs.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Farewell to Unnecessary Energy Lifelines Reform Act of 2021 or the FUEL Reform Act.

section.header: Repeal of Department of Agriculture bioenergy subsidy programs and other related subsidy programs
section.text: Title IX of the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 (7 U.S.C. 8101 et seq.) is repealed.
